PSCT.Base: Discard 1 card; add 2 "T.G." monsters with different names from your Deck to your hand. You can banish this card from your GY, then target 1 "T.G." monster in your GY; shuffle it into the Deck, or if you control a Machine "T.G." monster, you can add it to your hand instead. You can only use 1 "T.G. Limiter Removal" effect per turn, and only once that turn.
